text: aur main un chizo se kaise daro jin ko tum ne shareek banaaya hai, halaan ke tum us baath se nahi darte ke tum ne Allah ke saath aisi chizo ko shareek teh raaya hai jin par Allah taâ€™ala ne koyi daleel naazil nahi farmaayi, so in do jamaato mein se aman ka zyaada mus-taheq kaun hai, agar tum qabar rakhte ho
